0001000000011110 1100111001110111 1 -> sum: 1101111010010110, cout: 0
0100100010110011 0011011111110011 0 -> sum: 1000000010100110, cout: 0
1110011110110010 0001101101111010 0 -> sum: 0000001100101100, cout: 1

1011001111011000 0010010010011011 0 -> sum: 1101100001110011, cout: 0
0101011000110110 1111000110101100 1 -> sum: 0100011111100011, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
